page.title: 08WHEELWRIGHT
page.content: Mr Jones is the wheelwright and his workshop is located :North of the Worcester and Hereford road as soon as you go past the Malvern road and the oasthouses.We asked Mr Jones how often does he sell wheels ? He said , "I don't sell as many wheels now as I used but when someone wants one I make one."Mr Jones makes everything wooden like window frames and signs .The only time Mr Jones hurt himself was when he broke his thumb by dropping a bit of timber on it .The business has been in the family since 1896.MrJones has been in the business for 50 years having taken over from his father twelve years ago.His biggest present order is a new snooker table.He still uses wooden tools some of which are more than 50 years old. UOY04320102
